name: Aurelion Sol
title: The Star Forger
lore: Aurelion Sol once graced the vast emptiness of the cosmos with celestial wonders of his own devising. Now, he is forced to wield his awesome power at the behest of a space-faring empire that tricked him into servitude. Desiring a return to his star-forging ways, Aurelion Sol will drag the very stars from the sky, if he must, in order to regain his freedom.
blurb: Aurelion Sol once graced the vast emptiness of the cosmos with celestial wonders of his own devising. Now, he is forced to wield his awesome power at the behest of a space-faring empire that tricked him into servitude. Desiring a return to his...
allytips: You can use Comet of Legend's flight to grow Starsurge to massive proportions.
Save Voice of Light to use as a defense against melee opponents if you need to - otherwise, use its slow to start a fight at long range.
Comet of Legend allows you to move quickly around the map; use it to put pressure on other lanes.
enemytips: Try to get inside his orbit, since his stars can't hurt you up close.
His stars disappear while stunned or silenced, giving you an easy opportunity to fight him.
He gains speed while chasing in a straight line, but taking damage makes him lose that momentum.
His Starsurge ability can grow to cover a huge area - don't stay in the same place too long!

riot_spells.name: Starsurge
riot_spells.description: Aurelion Sol creates an expanding disk, which explodes to stun and damage enemies when it moves too far away from him.
riot_spells.tooltip:
First Press: Aurelion Sol creates a new stellar core, which grows over time and grants him {{ e2 }}% Movement Speed.

The core will detonate when it reaches his Outer Limit, applying {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and stunning enemies for {{ effect4amount*.25 }} to {{ e4 }} second(s) based on size.

Second Press: Detonate the core early.

riot_spells.name: Celestial Expansion
riot_spells.description: Aurelion Sol pushes his stars farther out, increasing their damage and speed.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Passive: Increases Star base damage by {{ starbasedamageincrease }}.

Active: Aurelion Sol's Stars expand their orbit to his Outer Limit, rotating more quickly and dealing {{ damagemultiplier*100 }}% damage for a total of {{ f1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) magic damage. Upon reactivation or after 3 seconds, the Stars retract and Aurelion Sol gains 40% movement speed, decaying over 1.5 seconds.

riot_spells.name: Comet of Legend
riot_spells.description: Aurelion Sol takes off flying for a long distance.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Fly for {{ e3 }} units in the chosen direction. Only castable outside of combat. Aurelion Sol can see and be seen over walls while flying.

Taking champion or turret damage will force a landing.

riot_spells.name: Voice of Light
riot_spells.description: Aurelion Sol projects a blast of pure starfire, damaging and slowing all enemies caught in it and knocking nearby enemies back to a safer distance.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Breathes out a blast of pure starfire, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slowing by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

The blast will also knock nearby enemies back to Aurelion Sol's Outer Limit.

i1.name: Center of the Universe
i1.blurb: Stars orbit Aurelion Sol, dealing magic damage when they hit an enemy.
i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Aurelion Sol''' is constantly orbited by three ''Stars'', each doing a full circumference in {{fd|5.25}} seconds, and beyond them exists an {{as|Outer Limit|buzzword}} affecting his damaging [[Champion ability|abilities]].
i1.description2: The ''Stars'' deal {{pp|16;18;20;22;24;27;30;35;40;45;50 to 120|formula=16+2 per level until lvl 5, then+3 until lvl 7, then+5 per level until lvl 11, then+10 per level}} {{as|(+ {{pp|type = [[File:Celestial Expansion.png|20px|border|link=]] Celestial Expansion's Rank|5|5 to 25}})|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 25% AP)}} {{tip|magic damage|{{As|magic damage}}}} and apply [[spell effects]] to enemies that come in contact with them, executing {{tip|minions}} below {{sti|health|{{as|25 health}}}}.
i1.cooldown: {{tt|2 seconds|The time within which the same star cannot damage the same target twice.}}
i1.notes:
* '''Aurelion Sol's''' ''Stars'' have independent vision hitboxes, meaning that they may remain visible even while he is within a [[brush]], and must be in the brush themselves in order to be hidden. 
** In addition to not being considered to be projectiles for interception purposes, it is possible that his ''Stars'' are considered [[champion summoned units]].
* An individual ''Star'' must complete at least one third of its orbit before it can damage the same target again. 
* In the event that an enemy orbits around '''Aurelion Sol''' at the same rate as his ''Stars'' without leaving their hitbox, they will take damage once every third of the way around.
* {{tip|Stasis}} from friendly sources (allied {{ai|Tempered Fate|Bard}}, {{ii|Zhonya's Hourglass}}, etc.) does not disable ''Center of the Universe''.

q1.name: Starsurge
q1.blurb: Aurelion Sol creates an expanding disk, which explodes to stun and damage enemies when it moves too far away from him.
q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Aurelion Sol''' fires the core of a newborn star in the target direction, which expands as long as it remains within the {{as|Outer Limit|buzzword}} and grants him {{sti|ms|{{as|20% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}}.
q1.description2: Upon traveling beyond the {{as|Outer Limit|buzzword}}, the core {{ai|Starsurge 2|Aurelion Sol|detonates}}, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies caught within and {{tip|stun|stunning}} them, increased by {{pp|13|key=%|type=time traveled|0;25;50;75;100 to 300|0;0.1875;0.375;0.5625;0.75 to 5}}. The core can also be manually detonated after {{fd|0.25}} seconds.
q1.leveling2: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|70 to 230}} {{as|(+ 65% AP)}}}}{{st|Minimum Stun Duration|{{ap|0.55 to 0.75}}|Maximum Stun Duration|{{ap|2.2 to 3}}}}
q1.description3: If '''Aurelion Sol''' is faster than the missile, the missile speed will increase to keep up.
q1.notes:
* So long as '''Aurelion Sol''' manages to keep Starsurge within the '''Outer Limit''', it will continue to expand until detonated or out of range, giving this ability the largest range and radius of any ability in the game.
* Both instances count as ability activations for the purposes of effects such as {{nie|Spellblade}} and {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
* ''Starsurge's'' size grows by {{fd|36.67}} units per second.

w1.name: Celestial Expansion
w1.blurb: Aurelion Sol pushes his stars farther out, magnifying their damage.
w1.description: {{sbc|Passive:}} The {{ai|Center of the Universe|Aurelion Sol|Stars'}} '''base''' [[damage]] is increased.
w1.description2: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Aurelion Sol''' [[File:Celestial Expansion 2.png|20px|link=|border]] pushes his {{ai|Center of the Universe|Aurelion Sol|Stars}} out to the {{as|Outer Limit|buzzword}}, rotating them at a high but decaying speed, and increasing their '''total''' damage by 50%.
w1.description3: Upon reactivating or after 3 seconds, the stars retract and grant '''Aurelion Sol''' {{as|40% '''bonus''' movement speed}}, decaying over {{fd|1.5}} seconds
w1.notes:
*''Celestial Expansion'' does not apply Muramana's ''Shock'' passive.
* Due to being an extension of his innate, [[crowd control]] that inhibits the use of abilities will also disable ''Celestial Expansion'' and put it on cooldown.
** Although {{tip|stasis}} from friendly sources ({{ai|Tempered Fate|Bard}}, {{ii|Zhonya's Hourglass}}, etc.) does not disable ''Celestial Expansion''.
* Toggle-able abilities do not count as an ability activation for the purposes of effects such as {{nie|Spellblade}} and {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
* Toggle-able abilities heal for up to 25 health per second when purchasing {{ii|Rod of Ages}}.

e1.name: Comet of Legend
e1.blurb: Aurelion Sol gains speed while moving in one continuous direction, and can take off flying for a long distance.
e1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Aurelion Sol''' pulls in his {{ai|Center of the Universe|Aurelion Sol|Stars}} and {{tip|dash|takes flight}} in the chosen direction. While in flight '''Aurelion Sol''' is {{tip|ghosted}}, has {{tip|unobstructed vision}} and can ignore terrain collision.
e1.description2: If '''Aurelion Sol''' takes damage from {{tip|champions}} or {{tip|turrets}}, or is {{tip|immobilize|immobilized}}, ''Comet of Legend'' will instantly end. ''Comet of Legend'' can also be canceled by issuing a movement command or reactivating the ability after {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
e1.description3: ''Comet of Legend'' cannot be activated for 4 seconds after '''Aurelion Sol''' has been damaged by a champion or turret.
e1.flavorsound: {{sm2|AurelionSol.start01.ogg|''"They call me a comet. They call me a dragon. They have no words for my true form."''}}
e1.notes:
* Effects that instantly cancel {{ai|Comet of Legend 2||Comet of Legend}}.
** {{ii|Stopwatch}} and {{ii|Zhonya's Hourglass}}.
** {{ii|Hextech Protobelt-01}}.
** {{si|Flash}}.
* Effects that can be activated during {{ai|Comet of Legend 2||Comet of Legend}} without cancelling it.
** Every other item effect (including {{ii|Hextech GLP-800}}).
** {{ai|Starsurge|Aurelion Sol}}.

r1.name: Voice of Light
r1.blurb: Aurelion Sol projects a blast of pure starfire, damaging and slowing all enemies caught in it and knocking nearby enemies back to a safer distance.
r1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Aurelion Sol''' exhales a wave of starfire in a line, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies hit, {{tip|slow|slowing}} for 2 seconds and {{tip|airborne|knocking targets back}} to the {{as|Outer Limit|buzzword}} if they are within.
